app.name: GitQuest
app.tagline: Learn Git by playing. Level by level.

levels.title: Levels
levels.description: Complete quests to earn XP and unlock new levels.

level1.title: Quest 1: First Repository
level1.subtitle: Initialize a repository
level1.hint: Use git init to turn this folder into a Git repository.
level1.welcome: Welcome! Your first task is to create a new Git repository. Run git init to initialize one in this folder.
level1.success: Nice! You've initialized a repository. Git created a .git folder and set up the default branch "main". Quest complete!
level1.already: This folder is already a Git repository. You've completed this quest!

level2.title: Quest 2: Stage & Commit
level2.subtitle: Stage files and create a commit
level2.hint: Use git add to stage files, then git commit with a message.
level2.welcome: Time to save your work! Stage the modified file, then commit with a message.
level2.staged: File staged. Now enter a commit message and click Commit.
level2.success: Commit created! Your changes are now in the repository history.

level3.title: Quest 3: Git Branch
level3.subtitle: Create and switch branches
level3.hint: Branches let you work on different lines of development. Create a new branch, then switch to it.
level3.welcome: Branches let you try out ideas without affecting the main line. Create a new branch, then switch to it.
level3.branchCreated: Branch "{name}" created. Now switch to it to work there.
level3.success: You created a branch and switched to it. Quest complete!

level4.title: Quest 4: Git Merge
level4.subtitle: Merge branches and resolve conflicts
level4.hint: Merge brings changes from one branch into another. If the same file was changed in both, you'll need to resolve the conflict.
level4.objectiveMerge: Merge a branch (with or without conflict)
level4.welcome: Merging combines two branches. Choose which branch to merge into (target) and which to merge from (source), then click Merge.
level4.mergeSuccess: Merge complete! The branches are combined.
level4.conflictExplanation: The same file was changed in both "{source}" and "{target}". Choose how to resolve.
level4.conflictDetected: Conflict detected. Choose "Keep current branch" or "Use incoming changes" to resolve.
level4.errorSameBranch: Source and target must be different branches.
level4.errorNoCommits: Branch "{branch}" has no commits to merge.

mood.idle: I'm here when you need me. Try the objective above!
mood.encouraging: You've got this! Follow the quest steps.
